Status.description: <ai-hint>Online for active users, Away for inactive, Busy for do-not-disturb, Offline for unavailable</ai-hint>
Status.name: Status

Alt.aiHint: Use descriptive text like 'John Doe profile picture' for screen readers
Alt.description: <ai-hint>Use descriptive text like "John Doe's profile picture" for screen readers</ai-hint>
Alt.name: Alt

RAvatar.commonUse: user profiles, team members, contact lists, navigation headers
RAvatar.aiPrompt: Create a professional avatar for user representation

patterns.user-avatar: ImageSrc="/avatar.jpg" Alt="User Name" for profile pictures

RAvatar.name: RAvatar

componentUsage.cards: Use RCard with elevation for content containers
componentUsage.buttons: Use RButton with proper Variant for different action types
componentUsage.forms: Use RFormField with proper validation for user input

--color-{category}-{variant}.aiHint: Use semantic color variables for theming
